title: cell creator
description: generates a variety of grids based on user selection and allows for control over pattern; # of cells in x and y; cell size; and origin
feature requests: system of standardizing grids and grid choices. currently feels arbitrary

title: cell patternizer
description: creates a variety of unique patterns based on grid cell inputs and other user conditions
feature requests: a stronger relationship between the cell creator and the patternizer. currently some cells break the patternizer and some patterns are weak. would like a relationship and some standardization of the work to make things easier to use and modify

title: image sampler
description: creates a variable scale geometric array/grid based on the light and dark tonal values of a user defined image

title: cluster unlocker
description: remove and/or reset the password on a grasshopper cluster
